io.sphere.internal.request

Class SphereResultRaw<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.internal.util.Validation<T,SphereBackendException>
      • io.sphere.internal.request.SphereResultRaw<T>

  • @Immutable
public final class SphereResultRaw<T>
extends Validation<T,SphereBackendException>
    Raw result of a request to the Sphere backend, used internally by the Java client.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class io.sphere.internal.util.Validation

        error, value

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> SphereResultRaw<R> castError()
      If error, creates a new error result of given type (doesn't transform anything, just changes the type).

      Creates a new erroneous result.

      • getValue

        public T getValue()
        Description copied from class: Validation
        If this is a successful result, returns the value. You should always check for isSuccess before calling this method.
        Overrides:
        getValue in class Validation<T,SphereBackendException>

      • transform

        public <R> SphereResultRaw<R> transform(@Nonnull
                               com.google.common.base.Function<T,R> successFunc)
        If successful, transforms the success value. Otherwise does nothing.

      • castError

        public <R> SphereResultRaw<R> castError()
        If error, creates a new error result of given type (doesn't transform anything, just changes the type). Otherwise throws an exception
